item.title: By: rogerglewis
item.dc:creator: rogerglewis
item.description:
Hi Alison, yes please, please share and let's get a proper conversation started. The Tools as they stand are agnostic and totally customisable at any Scale from the Single to Infinite. I have one rule in life that I swear by, Do unto others...( The Golden Rule). John and I have talked a few times about the Ego aspects of modern discourse. One of Wikipedias tenets is assuming good faith.
Be polite, and welcoming to new users
− Assume good faith
− Avoid personal attacks
− For disputes, seek dispute resolution
I take all of these principles on board and there is nothing here we can not resolve. https://longhairedmusings.wordpress.com/2019/01/21/wikipedia-editing-my-pragideological-manifesto/
I did two live internet broadcasts yesterday on Bittube , they explain the ideas behind WikiCitizen and the CantonDirectDemocracy Voting APPS suite.
Thanks for the feedback Alison hopefully John will direct his quil at this , my own skills are technical and backroom/engine room biased, John and you are much better at explaining stuff than I am. SO thanks for spending some time on this,
All the best
Rog
https://bit.tube/play?hash=QmSkkGRai1ApPh69Ux84sRECwUmhdVNiEt8DzNebV78Kqm&channel=285685
item.content:encoded:
Hi Alison, yes please, please share and let’s get a proper conversation started. The Tools as they stand are agnostic and totally customisable at any Scale from the Single to Infinite.
I have one rule in life that I swear by, Do unto others…( The Golden Rule).
John and I have talked a few times about the Ego aspects of modern discourse.
One of Wikipedias tenets is assuming good faith.

Be polite, and welcoming to new users

− Assume good faith

− Avoid personal attacks

− For disputes, seek dispute resolution

I take all of these principles on board and there is nothing here we can not resolve.
https://longhairedmusings.wordpress.com/2019/01/21/wikipedia-editing-my-pragideological-manifesto/

I did two live internet broadcasts yesterday on Bittube , they explain the ideas behind WikiCitizen and the CantonDirectDemocracy Voting APPS suite.

Thanks for the feedback Alison hopefully John will direct his quil at this , my own skills are technical and backroom/engine room biased, John and you are much better at explaining stuff than I am. SO thanks for spending some time on this,

All the best

Rog

https://bit.tube/play?hash=QmSkkGRai1ApPh69Ux84sRECwUmhdVNiEt8DzNebV78Kqm&channel=285685

item.title: By: alisonfletch
item.dc:creator: alisonfletch
item.description: Roger, Can I share your thoughts on the way forward with a lady on Twitter? She seems concerned about the split in votes and is talking about getting behind one party that speaks for all Brexiteers. She thinks UKIP and Brexit Party are a problem in this context!? But I think you are going for a slightly more subtle approach in that you just see which party is best to support in each constituency? I guess the trouble with that is getting the message out to the voters in that seat if they are not privy to your software.
item.content:encoded:
Roger,
Can I share your thoughts on the way forward with a lady on Twitter? She seems concerned about the split in votes and is talking about getting behind one party that speaks for all Brexiteers. She thinks UKIP and Brexit Party are a problem in this context!?
But I think you are going for a slightly more subtle approach in that you just see which party is best to support in each constituency?
I guess the trouble with that is getting the message out to the voters in that seat if they are not privy to your software.
